channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1865; 12:28AM; 11400 Poema Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/44ZRnKJ; Unincorporated Santa Susana Mountains; A collaborative effort between the three Fire Departments resulted in all forward progress being stopped in 37 minutes, with no injuries and no structures damaged. Cause under investigation.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; BC15 BC17 E103 E105 E106 E107 E28 E290 E296 E70 E8 EM15 H1 H2 H3 H4 HA1 HA2 HA3 HA4 RA90 T90 T96; CH5; 17; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1865; 11:51PM; 11500 N Topanga Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/43FcXmE; #Chatsworth; *Address tentative* Approximately one-half acre of brush on fire, threatening townhomes. Automatic aid brush responses are also coming from LACoFD and Ventura Co FD.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 E103 E106 E107 E28 E290 E296 E70 E8 EM15 H1 H2 H3 HA1 HA2 HA3 RA90 T90 T96; CH5; 17; Nicholas Prange

Traffic Collision; INC#1539; 07:06PM; 12700 W Vanowen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/43EYQOj; #ValleyGlen; Firefighters and Paramedics responded to find a 5-vehicle collision, with no trapped patients. Five adult patients and one pediatric patient were transported from the scene in fair condition. LAPD Inc # 3535.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E239 E260 E289 EM11 EM14 EM15 EM17 RA100 RA102 RA76 RA78 RA86 RA889 RA898 RA90 RA903 T39 T60 T89; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

title.a: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire 07/24/2023 INC#0997

item.description: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire; INC#0997; 03:00PM; 18613 Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Oo7RXz; #Tarzana; Updated size of the fire is one acre in a very remote area of heavy brush/steep terrain. Seventy-five LAFD firefighters by ground and air, with the help of MRCA and LA County FD, stopped all forward progress of the fire in one hour and nine minutes. Firefighters are continuing to establish hose lines around the perimeter and fortify/improve fire lines. No reported injuries and no structures damaged. Cause under investigation.; FS 109; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC17 BC9 CE83 CM40 CM42 DZ45 E108 E109 E273 E290 E293 E73 E8136 E8137 E8138 E8139 E8140 E83 E84 E88 E93 E99 EM17 FR82 FR91 H2 H3 H4 H7 HA2 HA3 HA4 HA7 HE1 RA90 RA93 RA99 RH114 T73 T90 T93 WT88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#0997; 01:51PM; 18613 Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Oo7RXz; #Tarzana; *Address is approximate* Three acres of heavy brush burning, with a moderate rate of spread. Currently, no structures threatened.; FS 109; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC17 E108 E109 E273 E290 E293 E73 E84 E88 E93 E99 EM17 FR82 FR91 H2 H3 H4 H7 HA2 HA3 HA4 HA7 RA90 RA99 T73 T90 T93; CH5; 17; Nicholas Prange

Cliff Rescue (Vehicle) - Fatality; INC#0624; 10:31AM; 22450 W Santa Susana Pass Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QaD6qf; #Chatsworth; Firefighters found a vehicle over the side of Santa Susana Pass Rd, with one occupant (driver) deceased. One canine was located in or near the vehicle (appears to be in good condition) and Animal Services is responding to assist. Firefighters are conducting a wider search of the area, but so far no additional patients have been located. LAFD will remain on scene to support the investigation being conducted by LAPD and Medical Examiner. Unknown age/gender/circumstances. MOTORISTS: Santa Susana Pass Rd is closed in both directions at this location (which is west of Iverson Rd/The Church at Rocky Peak). LAPD Inc # 1774. Nothing further.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 E107 E205 E288 E296 E88 EM15 H4 H7 HA4 HA7 HR3 RA104 RH114 T5 T88 T96 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1302; 07:52PM; 12885 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/44XEC3j; #Pacoima; Forty-nine firefighters responded to a large outside fire near a commercial building, and flames that spread to a 40-foot trailer. Firefighters extinguished the outside fire and the trailer in 32 minutes, successfully protecting the nearby business. One firefighter sustained burns to an extremity and will be transported in fair condition. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AR1 BC1 BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E203 E27 E275 E288 E298 E7 E75 E90 E91 E95 E98 EM15 HR3 PH1 RA75 RA898 RA98 SQ95 T3 T75 T88 T98 UR3 UR88; CH8; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1322; 07:45PM; 470 W 60th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Y411tr; Vermont-Slauson; It took 30 firefighters 14 minutes to extinguish the heavy fire in a one-story commercial building that was the site of previous burns. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E221 E233 E33 E46 RA57 SQ21 T21 T33; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1302; 07:20PM; 12902 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Drvl80; #Pacoima; Large outside fire, threatening a row of commercial buildings, with possible wires down.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC1 BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E203 E27 E275 E288 E298 E7 E75 E90 E91 E98 EM15 HR3 RA75 RA898 T3 T75 T88 T98 UR3 UR88; CH9; 17 18; Nicholas Prange
